channel.title: Fullscreen client
channel.description: Hi, is there a way that iu can make my client fullscreen or atleast bigger then it was before? i have looked everywhere and couldn't find how.

item.title: Fullscreen client
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

Tabs for menus, chat history, chat insertion bar, right click area, half height… oh its a pain but do-able.

Read full topic

item.title: Fullscreen client
item.dc:creator: @Zilent Zilent
item.description:
@Zilent wrote:

It’s not an overly complicated job, it’s just a matter of setting the x and y offsets of the graphic displays as a proportion of the overall client height and width. Example (not in any syntax):

drawString(“hi”, 256, 84); //Before
drawString(“hi”, gameWidth / 2 + offset, gameHeight / 2 + offset); //offset can be (- or +)
or
(not final if you are using the resize event listener);
private final int pGameHeight = gameHeight / 2;
private final int pGameWidth = gameWidth / 2;
drawString(“hi”, pGameWidth, pGameHeight);

Read full topic
